message.body: Hi Jane, did you hear from Gerry? Dollar's shoe is off. I'm guessing I should soak and wrap before he goes out?
No,I did not,but yes,that is a good plan,even if it falls off,it will help
I talked to him, he says soak and poultice and he'll put the shoe back on in 4 or 5 days. He suggested turning him out in the paddock, what do you think? Also, should he still get bute?
Maybe bute another day or two,and turned out wherever he will not pace or walk extra! Probably better to follow normal routine?

Yeah, even though the paddock is smaller I think he might worry and walk more! I am going to tape that foot up good and just put him out in the big field, I think - it's just him & Bach and he is not wild at all. I'll do bute for the next couple days too. Thanks!
